title: Bug 6410: File unchanged but dirtied by code assist
description: Bug 6410: File remains unchanged but is marked as dirty by code assist.
OB: When using code assist with no suggestions available, the file is marked as dirty even though no changes have been made.
EB: If code assist has no suggestions available, it should not mark the file as dirty.
SR:
1122. To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open a Java file.
2. Place the cursor inside the leftmost parenthesis of a method call.
3. For example, consider "I" to be the cursor below:
   Object o = anotherObject.method(I);
4. Press CtrlSpace.
